Registration Learn Translate + Revise Community Work Accuracy Check Voice Studio Finalize View + Share Story Tell-Back Slide Tell-Back Story Templates Word Links List Language Information Translator Information Accuracy Checker Info Trainer Information Archive Information Language (being translated into) Ethnologue Code Country Province/State/Region Village/Town/City Language (being translated from) Orthography Status: Name Spoken Languages Phone E-mail Location Education Level Communication Preference: Location Type: Skip Registration Select From: Revert To The Original Image? Do you want to revert to the original image? Welcome to Story Publisher Adv Use internal demo Please create and then Select a new folder, needed for running the demo. Exit Registration? "Are you sure you want to exit registration? Your changes will not be saved." Skip Registration? Submit Registration via... "Are you sure you want to skip registration? Don't worry, we'll save what you have so far." Submit? Are you ready to submit? You have left some fields blank. Continue with submission? Submission Error Please provide an database email address Registration information saved! SPapp.training@gmail.com Choose a new name Type a back translation or spell the name. Recordings Back Translation Recordings Consultant Password Please enter the consultant password: Incorrect Password No stories found! No story templates found! The currently selected Workspace folder for story templates does not contain usable templates. Select the appropriate \'SP Workspace\' folder - found on the SD card or in internal memory. There are no stories in progress. There are no completed stories. Story Publisher Adv is different from typical apps. You must create a Workspace folder in your phone storage. You will then download story templates into this folder.

You can do so by tapping the button below. Select the 1SP Workspace folder if it already exists or create a new folder and then select it. Tell the Story Publisher Adv app where to find story templates.

The next screen will be a \'folder picker\'.
Navigate to the SP Workspace folder (on the SD Card or in internal memory), then tap SELECT at the bottom. To download more story templates or access other options, open the main menu (tap the 3-lines icon top left corner). Please complete and submit the Registration to make it "hide". Demo functionality coming soon! All the information that the user types into the registration fields, plus phone type, is collected and used by the remote consultant in assisting and communicating with the user.
